title: Bug 6304 - Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When I open the context menu, the Team entry is missing.
EB: I expect the Team entry to be present in the context menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to a .java file and another resource.
3. Right-click to open the context menu.
4. Check if the Team entry is present in the context menu.
